meaningMnemonic:
著作 is "writing" or "authorship." The <kanji>rights</kanji> that writing has is what's known as <vocabulary>copyright</vocabulary>.

Note that 著作権 refers to copyright for anything, not just writing.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know 著作 first, too.
